servinfo.title: DTC B1546: A/C Refrigerant Pressure Malfunction

servinfosub.title: DTC Detecting Condition and Trouble Area

entry.ptxt: Outside temperature is more than specified value. However, refrigerant pressure is less than specified value.

s1.ptxt: Connect scan tool to DLC with ignition switch turned OFF.
Turn ON ignition switch and clear DTC using scan tool.
Start engine and warm up to normal operating temperature.
Start A/C system for 1 min. or more.

test1.ptxt: Connect scan tool to DLC with ignition switch turned OFF.
Turn ON ignition switch and clear DTC.
Turn ON ignition switch and check DTC.

action.ptxt: Confirm that vehicle A/C system condition referring A/C System Performance Inspection , and recheck DTC.

test1.ptxt: Connect scan tool to DLC with ignition switch OFF.
Ignition switch ON turned ON position.
Check refrigerant pressure displayed on scan tool.

action.ptxt: Charge refrigerant and Confirm that vehicle A/C system condition referring to A/C System Performance Inspection . And then recheck DTC.

testgroup.title: A/C system check

test1.ptxt: Confirm that vehicle A/C system condition referring to A/C System Performance Inspection .

testgroup.question: Is A/C system in good condition?

testgroup.title: Refrigerant pressure sensor check

test1.ptxt: Check refrigerant pressure sensor referring to A/C Refrigerant Pressure Sensor and Its Circuit Inspection (Petrol Engine Model) .

testgroup.question: Are refrigerant pressure sensor and/or its circuit in good condition?

action.ptxt: Repair circuit and/or replace refrigerant pressure sensor.

testgroup.title: Outside temperature sensor check

test1.ptxt: Check outside temperature sensor referring to Outside Air Temperature Sensor Inspection (If Equipped) .

testgroup.question: Is outside temperature sensor in good condition?
